answers.answer: I got my flu shot this past Wednesday and I never did get sick .I hope you feel better soon ;( maybe try taking some cold medicine or benadryl

question: I just got tested for gestational diabetes on Friday and I also got a few shots, one of them was for the flu. It was bummer timing because me and my hubby had this get away weekend planned. I'm now starting to not feel so well which I know is part of getting the shot. Any tips you can give so I can avoid getting miserable? Thanks
title: did you get your flu shot?
